attributes.action: Stop the building of a Titan prison on the Omega site at Warrington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the building of a Titan prison on the Omega site near the M62 at Warrington which will hold 2,500 prisoners. We already have four prisons in Warrington and to build this one so near to expensive private housing estates and four schools is not on. People living in the vicinity are up in arms about this and are already holding meetings against it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
